entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , St. Catharines
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:25 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -4.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 08:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -4.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -8.3°C
Wind: E 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon then snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets changing to rain or drizzle this evening and ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then clearing. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 20 near noon then light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. High 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
